text: Veterans Parkway (also known as the Southwest Bypass) is a long freeway in the Savannah metropolitan area, connecting Georgetown with downtown Savannah, within Chatham County. It is not a state route, nor is it maintained by the Georgia Department of Transportation (GDOT); it is one of the county- maintained freeways in Georgia. Most of the route runs beside Hunter Army Airfield (Hunter AAF), which is to the east of the highway. At its northern end, Interstate 516 (I-516) east and State Route 21 (SR 21) south provides access to Hunter AAF. ==References== Category:Savannah, Georgia Category:Roads in the United States Category:Transport in Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Veterans Parkway (Savannah, Georgia)
